Package dev.kitteh.playervaults.api.property

Interface PropertyHolder

All Known Subinterfaces:
Bundle.Builder
@NullMarked public interface PropertyHolder
Holder of properties!

    • property

      <Type> Optional<Type> property(Property<Type> property)
      Gets the value stored for a particular property, or the default (Property.defaultValue()) value if none stored.

      Type - value type

    • property

      <Type> Optional<Type> property(Property<Type> property, @Nullable Type value)
      Sets the value stored for a particular property.
      Type Parameters:
      Type - value type
      Parameters:
      property - property to set
      value - value to set
      Returns:
      previous value, or empty if not set (or if was set as null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if trying to set a null value on a primitive wrapper

    • removeProperty

      <Type> Optional<Type> removeProperty(Property<Type> property)
      Removes the value stored for a particular property.
      Type Parameters:
      Type - value type
      Parameters:
      property - property to remove
      Returns:
      value present, or empty if not set (or if was set as null)
